name: Welly Wang VR
summary: Lets face it, the best bit of VR is chucking things and hitting things, so why not visit the circus and get your own back on those pesky clowns. Welly Wang lets you satisfy your need to hit and throw a wide range of things at lots of different targets.  Comprising of 24 quick fire levels, throw wellies through hoops, chuck food into toilets, knock tin cans off walls or hook ducks out of a bath, all against the clock.  Now with Head to Head combat!  Last One Standing combat coming...
